name: Keynote Presentation Data File
summary: Learn about .APXL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: KEY files are saved in a .ZIP format and contain multiple files, one of which is the APXL file for the presentation.

description: File contained within a .KEY file and used by Keynote presentation software; specifies the contents of a Keynote presentation in an XML format; includes the list of slides, the layout and formatting for each slide, and the presentation text.
